The figure shows a process by which a cell might absorb food from its surrounding environment and break it down for use as a source of energy and matter. The process involves lysosomes, which are membrane-bound organelles that contain hydrolytic enzymes. Activation of the hydrolytic enzymes requires an acidic <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>, and lysosomes maintain an internal acidic <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> by using ion pumps.

Which of the following outcomes will most likely result from a loss of ion pump function in the cellâ€™s lysosomes?

choices.label: The internal <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> of the lysosomes will decrease, which will prevent the activation of hydrolytic enzymes and interfere with the intracellular digestion of food.

The internal <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> of the lysosomes will increase, which will prevent the activation of hydrolytic enzymes and interfere with the intracellular digestion of food.

The internal <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> of the lysosomes will decrease, which will activate hydrolytic enzymes and enhance the intracellular digestion of food.

The internal <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> of the lysosomes will increase, which will activate hydrolytic enzymes and enhance the intracellular digestion of food.

content.answer: The internal <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> of the lysosomes will increase, which will prevent the activation of hydrolytic enzymes and interfere with the intracellular digestion of food.
